posts.message: Very Good Hidden Blog .. from Mozilla
posts.caption: blog.mozilla.com
posts.description: SELECT ds, dnt_type,  count(distinct ip_address)  FROM web_logs WHERE (request_url LIKE ‘%Firefox/4.0%’ OR request_url LIKE ‘%Firefox/5.0%’ OR request_url LIKE ‘%Firefox/6.0%’) AND dnt_type != ‘DNT:1, 1′ AND ds = ‘$dateTime’ GROUP BY ds, dnt_type ORDER BY ds desc;
